title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7441.8 - Heating, plumbing, electrical, mechanical ventilation systems and equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7441.8 - Heating, plumbing, electrical, mechanical ventilation systems and equipment

State Regulations

Heating, plumbing, electrical, mechanical ventilation
systems and equipment shall be maintained in a good, safe, sanitary, and
serviceable condition and in compliance with all applicable laws, codes, rules
and regulations related thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7441.8

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
